thread.title: St. Patrick’s Day Celebration at 321 Lime House Set for March 17 in Cape Canaveral
thread.title_full: St. Patrick’s Day Celebration at 321 Lime House Set for March 17 in Cape Canaveral

author: Space Coast Daily
title: St. Patrick’s Day Celebration at 321 Lime House Set for March 17 in Cape Canaveral
text:
St. Patrick’s Day Celebration at 321 Lime House Set for March 17 in Cape Canaveral
By
Space Coast Daily // March 14, 2024
celebration runs from 1 p.m. to 8 p.m.
BREVARD COUNTY, FLORIDA – Are you ready for the best St. Patrick’s Day celebration ever on the Space Coast?
Get your shamrock on and join
321 Lime House on March 17, 2024, from 1 p.m. to 8 p.m., located at 200 Imperial Blvd. in Cape Canaveral.
This year, we have planned an incredible day filled with fun, food, and of course, plenty of beer.
All Day Pints
At our event, we are offering all-day pints for just $5.
This is the perfect opportunity to try a variety of beers and ciders from our selection, be sure to check out the Cataclysmic Barrel Treated Sout.
For those who are interested in learning more about our brewing process, we will also be giving brewery tours from 1 p.m. to 4 p.m. It’s a great chance to go behind the scenes and see how your favorite beers and ciders are made.
Fowl Mouth Food Truck
No celebration is complete without delicious food! We are excited to have the Fowl Mouth food truck joining us for the day. They will be serving up their mouthwatering specialties all day, so be sure to come hungry.
Live Tikki Band
We are thrilled to announce that we will have a live Tikki band performing. Get ready to dance and sing along to some great music. Their lively tunes will definitely add to the festive atmosphere.
Unlimited Beers & Ciders
For those who fancy themselves beer and cider connoisseurs, we have good news for you. We are offering unlimited beer and cider for $30! It’s an excellent opportunity to taste a wide range of flavors. Who knows, you might just find your new favorite drink.
So, mark your calendars and get ready to have a fantastic time. Don’t forget to wear green! We can’t wait to celebrate St. Patrick’s Day with you. For more information about our brewery feel free to visit our website at
www.caribbreweryusa.com
Let’s get lucky and celebrate St. Patrick’s Day together! See you there.
